column4: hey guys I have Karmic 9:10 and I need to go back 8:04 LTS ...how do I do this?
you have to install 8.04 from scratch, there is no downgrade capability....
What just insert cd and thats it?
is the only one have available at the moment
yes, just put in the cd and install. The catch is, you lose any 9.10 configuration. Save your /home somewhere safe if it has anything important in it.
another question: suppose just wanna reinstall Karmic 9:10 how do I do that?
nothing important just alittle program I run thats it...
how do I back it up?
same answer, put in the cd and install. Maybe I'm missing something, because the answer seems so simple?
copy it somewhere: to a blank cd or dvd, or to a different disk, or to a spare partition. Depends on your hardware....
I upgraded it from previous version into 9:10
it's ok to ask beginner questions here...
